name: The Spring
description:
The Spring is a game about suicide.

It is a game of thoughts, played like a poem on cards for you to read. There are no endings here. It is just a presentness.

This is a 0 player game. Instead of a player, you are a witness. Your role in this game is to listen with care. This includes care for your own well-being. Listen to your own needs, and step away if your body asks you to.

If you decide to play, I encourage you to get the game for free. You can always come back and donate if this meant something to you.

The downloadable .rtf file includes a link and password to play this game in your browser. 

Content Warnings

The Spring contains text references to the following: 
suicide, plans for suicide, death by suicide, self-harm, vomiting, drowning, neglect, child abuse, hospitalization, dysphoria, animal death.
